articles.title: Japan finds COVID-19 variant in three people with no record of travel to UK - Reuters
articles.description: Japanese doctors have detected a fast-spreading variant of the new coronavirus first discovered in Britain in three people who had not travelled there, the Health Ministry said on Monday.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
FILE PHOTO: Pedestrians wearing protective masks, amid the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) outbreak, make their way at Ginza shopping district which closed to cars on Sunday in Tokyo… [+1026 chars]
